name: Beyblade: GRevolution
description:
Back of Box - Game Boy Advance (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

BECOME A BEYBLADE™ CHAMPION!

Explore the entire Beyblade™ world, where you'll challenge the greatest Beybladers™ and collect valuable parts! Sharpen your battle skills on your quest to become World Champion!

(screenshot captions)

  • Collect and customize hundreds of blades and parts
  • Journey through a worldwide adventure
  • Battle rivals! Let It Rip!
